document_data.name: Groth
document_data.mainbody: '''Groth''' was a [[firbolg]] chieftain in charge of capturing the [[unicorn]] [[Kamerynn]] and strengthening the [[moonwell|Darkwell]] in [[Myrloch Vale]] by the Beast [[Kazgoroth]], both of which tasks he failed. Groth joined the [[Northlander]] chieftain [[Grunnarch|Grunnarch the Red King]] in the siege of [[Caer Corwell]], and was killed in the fighting.{{Cite digital book/Darkwalker on Moonshae|2358}}
